name: Lifferlas

trait.name: False Appearance
text: While Lifferlas remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree.

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
text: A druid of the Emerald Enclave awakened the tree Lifferlas with a spell. Goldenfields is his home, its people his friends. Children like to carve their name and initials into his body and hang from his boughs, and he's happy with that.
Ideal: "I exist to protect the people and plants of Goldenfields."
Bond: "Children are wonderful. I would do anything to make them feel happy and safe."
Flaw: "I can't remember people's names and often get them mixed up."

action.name: Slam
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 14 (3d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.
